description: H&R Block TaxCut was available for Windows and macOS, but H&R Block replaced the application in the 2009 tax year with H&R Block At Home. H&R Block then rebranded At Home software as Tax Software.

T02 files store tax preparation information saved by a user to save their progress. After saving a tax return, users can close the T02 file, then reopen it to work on it further. After completing the tax return, the user could file it.
